description:
Keep your feet warm on the coldest of days. The thick thermal yarn helps your feet stay toasty. The brushed long pile interior fabric provides a very soft on foot feel while trapping warm air close to the skin.

  • Heavy thermal yarn for extra warmth
  • Moisture wicking to keep you dry all day
  • Soft brushed inside pile provides comfort and extra warmth
  • Non-binding, diabetic-friendly design provides relief for cold feet due to circulation problems
name: Heat Holders Snowdrop Cream Block Twist Crew Socks - Women's
